author: bodewig
msg: first cut at adding Cocoon's dependencies, leaving those out which currently cannot be built on the zone

author: jukka
msg: TIKA-113: Metadata (such as title) should not be part of content
- Added BodyContentHandler that only processes XHTML body events
- Added utility constructors for WriteOutContentHandler and BodyContentHandler
- Updated test cases and related code to use BodyContentHandler where appropriate
- Removed AppendableAdaptor class as it's not used anymore

author: ate
msg: A lightweight "typical" logger interface allowing wrapping a Maven Log to be used by Commons Log while not depending on not requiring either of those logging api's to be required from a shared classpath.

author: gdamour
msg: Fix manifest Class-Path entries to include xbean-reflect.
